pages.text: By utilizing Magic and Alchemy, substances infused with energy can be created. These are often applied industrially.

pages.title: Archaefabric
pages.text: An animal tissue fully materialized by injecting Mana into the skin of a Phantom.$(br2)Due to its resistance to denaturation even when exposed to high concentrations of Mana or Alchemical Aspects, it is often used for producing Thread Pages or as a substitute for fabric.
